obfuscation: God blast it !
original: God blast it!

obfuscation: No , your kind never realises things till the crash comes -- usually when it 's too late .
original:
No, your kind never realises things till the crash
comes--usually when it's too late.

obfuscation: She kept on doing her work , I suppose -- taking care of her brothers and sisters , washing , cooking , sweeping , looking after your comfort -- worn away -- when she should have been in bed -- and -- -- But what 's the use of talking ?
original:
She kept on doing her work, I
suppose--taking care of her brothers and sisters, washing, cooking,
sweeping, looking after your comfort--worn out--when she should have
been in bed--and---- But what's the use of talking?

obfuscation: The damage is done .
original: The damage is done.

obfuscation: We 've got to set to work to repair it at once .
original:
We've got to set to work
to repair it at once.

obfuscation: I 'll write to-night to Dr. Stanton of the Hill Farm Sanatorium and find away if he has a vacancy .
original:
I'll write to-night to Dr. Stanton of the Hill
Farm Sanatorium and find out if he has a vacancy.

obfuscation: And if luck is with us we can mail her there at once .
original:
And if luck is with
us we can send her there at once.

obfuscation: The sooner the good .
original: The sooner the better.

obfuscation: Is it sendin ' Eileen away to a hospital you 'd exist ?
original:
Is it sendin' Eileen away
to a hospital you'd be?

obfuscation: Then you 'll not !
original: Then you'll not!

obfuscation: You 'll get that notion out of your head damn quick .
original:
You'll get that
notion out of your head damn quick.

obfuscation: It 's all nonsense you 're stuffin' me with , and lies , makin ' things out to be the worst in the world .
original:
It's all nonsense you're stuffin'
me with, and lies, makin' things out to be the worst in the world.

obfuscation: I'll not believe a word of Eileen having the consumption at all .
original:
I'll
not believe a word of Eileen having the consumption at all.

obfuscation: It's doctors ' notions to be always lookin ' for a sickness that 'd kill you .
original:
It's
doctors' notions to be always lookin' for a sickness that'd kill you.

obfuscation: She 'll not move a step out of here , and I say so , and I 'm her father !
original: She'll not move a step out of here, and I say so, and I'm her father!

obfuscation: You refuse to get your daughter go to a sanatorium ?
original: You refuse to let your daughter go to a sanatorium?

obfuscation: I do .
original: I do.

obfuscation: Then I 'll have to report her case to the Society for the Prevention of Tuberculosis of this county , and tell them of your refusal to help her .
original:
Then I'll have to report her case to the
Society for the Prevention of Tuberculosis of this county, and tell
them of your refusal to help her.

obfuscation: Report all you like , and be damned to you !
original: Report all you like, and be damned to you!

obfuscation: A majority of the most influential men of this city are behind the Society .
original:
A majority of the
most influential men of this city are behind the Society.

obfuscation: Do you know that ?
original:
Do you know
that?

obfuscation: We 'll find a way to move you , Carmody , if you try to be stubborn .
original:
We'll find a way to move you, Carmody, if you try to
be stubborn.

obfuscation: Ara , Doctor , you do n't understand the way of it at all .
original: Ara, Doctor,you don't see the way of it at all.

obfuscation: If Eileen goes to the hospital , who 's to be takin ' care of the others , and mindin ' the house when I'm off to work ?
original:
If Eileen goes to the hospital,
who's to be takin' care of the others, and mindin' the house when I'm
off to work?

obfuscation: You can easily hire some woman .
original: You can easily hire some woman.

obfuscation: Hire ?
original: Hire?

obfuscation: D'you think I 'm a millionaire itself ?
original: D'you think I'm a millionaire itself?

obfuscation: That 's where the shoe pinches , eh ?
original: That's where the shoe pinches, eh?

obfuscation: I 'm not going to waste any more words on you , Carmody , but I'm damn well going to understand this thing through !
original:
I'm not going to waste any more words on you, Carmody, but I'm
damn well going to see this thing through!

obfuscation: You might as well give in inaugural as last .
original:
You might as well give in
first as last.

obfuscation: But where 's the money comin ' from ?
original: But where's the money comin' from?
